languages.text: "Я часто слышу это слово — "ксенос"... похоже, оно столь же оскорбительно в вашем языке, как "мон-кай" — в нашем". {n}Женщина вздыхает.{/n} "Мы зовем себя {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Детьми Азуриана{/g}. Люди — те, кого судьба толкнула на путь союза с нами — называют нас эльдарами".

traits.locale_text: "Я часто слышу это слово — "ксенос"... похоже, оно столь же оскорбительно в вашем языке, как "мон-кай" — в нашем". {n}Женщина вздыхает.{/n} "Мы зовем себя детьми Асурьян. Люди — те, кого судьба толкнула на путь союза с нами — называют нас эльдарами".

languages.text: "I ofttimes hear this word spoken — 'xenos'... it appears to be as insulting in your tongue as 'mon-keigh' is in ours." {n}She sighs.{/n} "We call ourselves the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g}. The humans — those whom fate has brought to form an alliance with us — call us Aeldari."
languages.original_text: "Я часто слышу это слово — "ксенос"... похоже, оно столь же оскорбительно в вашем языке, как "мон-кай" — в нашем". {n}Женщина вздыхает.{/n} "Мы зовем себя {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Детьми Азуриана{/g}. Люди — те, кого судьба толкнула на путь союза с нами — называют нас эльдарами".

traits.locale_text: "I ofttimes hear this word spoken — 'xenos'... it appears to be as insulting in your tongue as 'mon-keigh' is in ours." {n}She sighs.{/n} "We call ourselves the children of Asuryan. The Humans — those whom fate has brought to form an alliance with us — call us Eldar."

"I ofttimes hear this word spoken — 'xenos'... it appears to be as insulting in your tongue as 'mon-keigh' is in ours." {n}She sighs.{/n} "We call ourselves the children of Asuryan. The Humans — those whom fate has brought to form an alliance with us — call us Eldar."

"I ofttimes hear this word spoken — 'xenos'... it appears to be as insulting in your tongue as 'mon-keigh' is in ours." {n}She sighs.{/n} "We call ourselves the children of Asuryan. The humans — those whom fate has brought to form an alliance with us — call us Aeldari."

"I ofttimes hear this word spoken — 'xenos'... it appears to be as insulting in your tongue as 'mon-keigh' is in ours." {n}She sighs.{/n} "We call ourselves the children of Asuryan. The humans — those whom fate has brought to form an alliance with us — call us Eldar."

"I ofttimes hear this word spoken — 'xenos'... it appears to be as insulting in your tongue as 'mon-keigh' is in ours." {n}She sighs.{/n} "We call ourselves the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g}. The humans — those whom fate has brought to form an alliance with us — call us Aeldari."

languages.text: “我经常会听到‘异形’这个词。在你们的语言中，这个词就像我们语言中的‘猴子’这个词一样，充满了侮辱性。”{n}她叹了口气。{/n}“我们自称{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}阿苏焉的子嗣{/g}。而那些人类，在命运的指引下与我们结盟的人，称呼我们为艾达灵族。”
languages.original_text: "I ofttimes hear this word spoken — 'xenos'... it appears to be as insulting in your tongue as 'mon-keigh' is in ours." {n}She sighs.{/n} "We call ourselves the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g}. The humans — those whom fate has brought to form an alliance with us — call us Aeldari."

traits.locale_text: “我经常会听到‘异形’这个词。在你们的语言中，这个词就像我们语言中的‘猴子’这个词一样，充满了侮辱性。”{n}她叹了口气。{/n}“我们自称{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}阿苏焉的子嗣{/g}。而那些人类，在命运的指引下与我们结盟的人，称呼我们为艾达灵族。”

languages.text: 「我はよく『異種族』という言葉を聞く…我らが『モン＝ケイ』と言うように、そちらの言語で侮辱を意味するようだな」{n}ユリエットはため息をつく。{/n}「我らは自らを{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}アシュリアンの御子{/g}と呼んでいる。人間は—我々と同盟を結ぶよう運命が連れてきた人間は、我らをアエルダリと呼んだ」
languages.original_text: "I ofttimes hear this word spoken — 'xenos'... it appears to be as insulting in your tongue as 'mon-keigh' is in ours." {n}She sighs.{/n} "We call ourselves the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g}. The humans — those whom fate has brought to form an alliance with us — call us Aeldari."

traits.locale_text: 「我はよく『異種族』という言葉を聞く…我らが『モン＝ケイ』と言うように、そちらの言語で侮辱を意味するようだな」{n}ユリエットはため息をつく。{/n}「我らは自らを{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}アシュリアンの御子{/g}と呼んでいる。人間は—我々と同盟を結ぶよう運命が連れてきた人間は、我らをアエルダリと呼んだ」

languages.text: "Ich höre dieses Wort oft – 'Xenos' ... es scheint in Eurer Sprache ebenso beleidigend zu sein wie 'Chem-Pan-Sey' in unserer." {n}Sie seufzt.{/n} "Wir selbst nennen uns die {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Kinder von Asuryan{/g}. Die Menschen – jene, die das Schicksal zu einer Allianz mit uns gebracht hat – nennen uns Aeldari."
languages.original_text: "I ofttimes hear this word spoken — 'xenos'... it appears to be as insulting in your tongue as 'mon-keigh' is in ours." {n}She sighs.{/n} "We call ourselves the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g}. The humans — those whom fate has brought to form an alliance with us — call us Aeldari."

traits.locale_text: "Ich höre dieses Wort oft – 'Xenos' ... es scheint in Eurer Sprache ebenso beleidigend zu sein wie 'Chem-Pan-Sey' in unserer." {n}Sie seufzt.{/n} "Wir selbst nennen uns die {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Kinder von Asuryan{/g}. Die Menschen – jene, die das Schicksal zu einer Allianz mit uns gebracht hat – nennen uns Aeldari."

languages.text: « J'entends souvent ce mot, "xénos"... Il semble aussi insultant dans votre langue que "mon-keigh" dans la nôtre, {n}dit-elle en poussant un soupir.{/n} Nous nous appelons les {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}enfants d'Asuryan{/g}. Les humains, ceux qui sont amenés par le destin à former une alliance avec nous, nous nomment les Aeldaris. »
languages.original_text: "I ofttimes hear this word spoken — 'xenos'... it appears to be as insulting in your tongue as 'mon-keigh' is in ours." {n}She sighs.{/n} "We call ourselves the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g}. The humans — those whom fate has brought to form an alliance with us — call us Aeldari."

traits.locale_text: « J'entends souvent ce mot, "xénos"... Il semble aussi insultant dans votre langue que "mon-keigh" dans la nôtre, {n}dit-elle en poussant un soupir.{/n} Nous nous appelons les {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}enfants d'Asuryan{/g}. Les humains, ceux qui sont amenés par le destin à former une alliance avec nous, nous nomment les Aeldaris. »

languages.text: «Esa palabra, "xenos", es común en vuestras conversaciones... Parece ser tan insultante en vuestra lengua como "mon-keigh" en la nuestra». {n}Suspira.{/n} «Nos llamamos los {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}hijos de Asuryan{/g}. Los humanos, aquellos a los que el destino ha llevado a formar una alianza con nosotros, nos llaman Aeldari».
languages.original_text: "I ofttimes hear this word spoken — 'xenos'... it appears to be as insulting in your tongue as 'mon-keigh' is in ours." {n}She sighs.{/n} "We call ourselves the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g}. The humans — those whom fate has brought to form an alliance with us — call us Aeldari."

traits.locale_text: «Esa palabra, "xenos", es común en vuestras conversaciones... Parece ser tan insultante en vuestra lengua como "mon-keigh" en la nuestra». {n}Suspira.{/n} «Nos llamamos los {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}hijos de Asuryan{/g}. Los humanos, aquellos a los que el destino ha llevado a formar una alianza con nosotros, nos llaman Aeldari».

languages.text: "Bu kelimeyi sık duyuyorum... 'Zeno' diyorsunuz hep. Sanırım sizin dilinizde bu bir hakaret. Hakeza bizim dilimizdeki 'mon-keigh' de öyle" {n}İç çekiyor.{/n} "Bizler kendimize {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryan'ın Çocukları{/g} diyoruz. Kaderin cilvesiyle ittifak kurduğumuz insanlarsa bize Aeldari diyor."
languages.original_text: "I ofttimes hear this word spoken — 'xenos'... it appears to be as insulting in your tongue as 'mon-keigh' is in ours." {n}She sighs.{/n} "We call ourselves the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g}. The humans — those whom fate has brought to form an alliance with us — call us Aeldari."

traits.locale_text: "Bu kelimeyi sık duyuyorum... 'Zeno' diyorsunuz hep. Sanırım sizin dilinizde bu bir hakaret. Hakeza bizim dilimizdeki 'mon-keigh' de öyle" {n}İç çekiyor.{/n} "Bizler kendimize {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryan'ın Çocukları{/g} diyoruz. Kaderin cilvesiyle ittifak kurduğumuz insanlarsa bize Aeldari diyor."
